topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547d094f636872091d170000#post_547d094f636872091d170000
Wrong.
A fire truck has eight wheels and four people.
And 4 plus 8 is 12.
And 12 feet is a ruler.
And Queen Elizabeth was a ruler.
But Queen Elizabeth was also the name of a ship.
And the ship sailed the sea.
And in the sea, there's fish.
And fish have fins.
And the Finns fought the Russian.
And the Russian are red.
So, fire truck are red because they're always Russian around.
topics.author: 5446fcfc6368723ec21a0000
